title: The Wrong Condition?
question_text: A study is to be done using a $t$-test for slope. Conditions need to be verified. All of the following need to be checked for the test to be done except one. Which answer is not a condition for a $t$-test for slope?

choices.text: Check that the points in the residual plot are scattered around the zero line.

Check to make sure that the population is at least
10
times the size of the sample.

Check for skewness and outliers if the sample size is less than
30
.
Check that stratified random samples are used.
Check the data to make sure it is linear.
